declarations.description: A cookie consent banner that helps manage user consent for cookies and tracking
declarations.name: u2-cookiebanner

members.description: The current consent object containing user's cookie preferences
members.name: consent

events.name: u2-cookiebanner-consent
events.description: Fired when user provides or updates their cookie consent

detail.isUpdate: boolean - Indicates if this is an update to existing consent
detail.consent: object - The current consent object with user preferences

methods.name: show
methods.description: Displays the cookie banner to the user

methods.name: setConsent
methods.description: Sets the user's cookie consent preferences

parameters.name: consent
parameters.description: Object containing the user's consent preferences

methods.name: emitConsent
methods.description: Emits the consent event with current preferences

parameters.name: isUpdate
parameters.description: Whether this is an update to existing consent

attributes.name: policy-link
attributes.description: URL to the privacy policy page

attributes.name: message
attributes.description: Custom message to display in the banner

attributes.name: categories
attributes.description: Space-separated list of cookie categories to manage (default: 'necessary functional analytics marketing'). Must be a subset of: necessary, functional, analytics, marketing

attributes.name: lang
attributes.description: Language code (e.g., 'en', 'de') for localization. If not set, falls back to the nearest parent's lang attribute or browser's language.

modules.description: Google Consent Mode integration for the cookie banner
Known cookies and tracking items that can be managed by the cookie banner
User interface components for the cookie banner
